Note.Quote: Jesus crossed to the far shore of the Sea of Galilee and a great crowd of people followed him because they saw the miraculous signs he had performed on the sick.

ListItem.Quote: At this the Jews began to grumble about him because he said , "I am the bread that came down from heaven." They said, "Is this not Jesus, the son of Joseph, whose father and mother we know?"”
From this time many of his disciples turned back and no longer followed him.

Note.Quote: "You do not want to leave too, do you?" Jesus asked the twelve. Simon Peter answered him, "Lord, to whom shall we go? You have the words of eternal life."”

Then Jesus said to them all, "If anyone would come after me, he must deny himself and take up his cross daily and follow me. For whoever wants to save his life will lose it, but whoever loses his life for me will save it."”

ListItem.Quote: Husbands, love your wives, just as Christ loved the church and gave himself up for her.

Note.Paragraph: TAKE AWAY: Is Jesus one of MANY or is he your one and ONLY?
